subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to use JUnits for PL/SQL Stored Procedure
msgSnippet: ... it, but it might be worth investigating. Never hear of PL/SQLUnit.  But there is utPLSQL : http://utplsql.sourceforge.net/ and it s the business. Cheers,
messageBody:
J B Rainsberger wrote:

>> There is something out there called PL/SQLUnit. I have never tried
it, but it might be worth investigating.

Never hear of PL/SQLUnit. But there is utPLSQL :
http://utplsql.sourceforge.net/ and it's the business.

Cheers, APC
